name: Fern Woods Escape
descriptionShort: Escape to Fern Woods, a hidden retreat just 2.5 hours north of YYZ, nestled in the serene woods of Haliburton. This one-of-a-kind sanctuary is designed to rekindle your most important relationships and offer unparalleled tranquility. Immerse yourself in a rare blend of modern luxury and untouched natural beauty.
descriptionLong: Escape to Fern Woods, a hidden retreat just 2.5 hours north of YYZ, nestled in the serene woods of Haliburton. This one-of-a-kind sanctuary is designed to rekindle your most important relationships and offer unparalleled tranquility. Immerse yourself in a rare blend of modern luxury and untouched natural beauty.

This bespoke tiny home is a masterpiece of comfort, featuring a state-of-the-art kitchen, climate control, and a spa-inspired bathroom with a bidet and steam shower. Step outside to your private mini Nordic spa, complete with a hot tub, cold plunge, and sauna for ultimate relaxation.

Stay connected with Starlink-powered Wi-Fi or unwind with premium cable TV. Every detail is thoughtfully curated, making Fern Woods Escape the perfect haven for luxury, connection, and rejuvenation. Rediscover serenity in this extraordinary woodland oasis.
shortDescription: Luxury tiny-home retreat with private Nordic spa (hot tub, cold plunge, sauna) in Haliburton.
